name: Kansas Quail
author: Tosha Fields
summary: This is the most requested camping food we have. We have these when we go camping EVERY time! We make dozens at a time and there are never any left. My son hates mushrooms and hates bacon but he eats these all up every time. These can also be cooked in the oven over a grill rack in a cake pan.
directions: Soak wooden skewers in a bowl of water for about 10 minutes
Preheat grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate
Wrap 1 slice bacon around each mushroom and thread onto skewers, leaving about 1/2 inch of space between each wrapped mushroom
Cook on the preheated grill, rotating the skewers often, until bacon is crispy, 10 to 15 minutes
